body:
#### PR description:

Modernize `CalibTracker/SiStripDCS`:
   * merge headers with plugin implementation
   * transformed legacy `EDAnalyzer`s into `edm::one::EDAnalyzer`s
   * add `fillDescriptions` methods  

#### PR validation:

It compiles.

title: modernize `CalibTracker/SiStripDCS`
